title: IdP Redirector Extension
name: idp-redirector
author: auth0
description: This extension implements safe, wildcard based redirection for SAML IdP initiated logins based on URLs from RelayState. The extension is setup as a target OIDC app for SAML IdP initiated connection.

auth0.scopes: create:clients read:clients update:clients delete:clients create:resource_servers read:resource_servers update:resource_servers delete:resource_servers read:connections create:client_grants read:client_grants create:rules read:rules delete:rules read:tenant_settings

DATADOG_API_KEY.description: The API key for sending logs to DataDog over HTTPs
